sect2.para: Metadata are information about a document, embedded in the document. For GIMP, they are image metadata.

note.para: PNG, JPEG, TIFF and WebP preserve existing metadata.

You can set defaults to enable or disable exporting metadata in all affected file formats on whether you want complete privacy or not. Select EditPreferences, then select Image Import & Export and go to the section Export Policies.

listitem.para:
You can access this command from the main menu through
Image Metadata .

sect3.title: The Metadata Submenu
sect3.para:
GIMP uses two plug-ins:
Edit Metadata.
View Metadata.
